title: Display issue with Beta Client
body:
I have no idea what is causing this issue but now it has become an annoyance. I am hoping that someone can help me out. 

This did not start till the 7.1 update. It never happened prior to that. 

But whenever I open the LoL Beta Client and if I click outside of it to browse the internet or go into iTunes, the screen goes black for a second. Almost like it is changing resolutions. This happens at all three different resolutions you can set the Client to. I even found that if I hide the taskbar, I can make 1920x1080 appear and I thought that would have done it, but it still continues to do that. 

Whenever I am in-game, I can quickly switch between my desktop and game without any disruption. 

I have a BENQ Zowie XL2411 if that would make a difference but I highly doubt it. I tried researching this all over and could not find an answer. 

Also to add, if I use the Legacy Client, this does not happen. When I am in the home screen, I can easily switch between any program on my computer without my display going black. So I have no idea why it is happening on the Beta Client.

Thank you and I hope that someone can figure this out for me.

replies.body: I just ran into this issue with the exact same monitor and fixed it by uninstalling the benq/zowie display pilot software. I hope this solves your issue or anyone who comes across the same issue. It's not a LoL issue as it happened to me in CS:GO as well. It's an issue with the monitor software.
Which browser are you using? Is this happening with Google Chrome or is this another browser entirely?
It does not matter. If I am in the LoL Beta Client and click onto my home screen, my screen goes black for 2 seconds like it is switching resolutions. It happens every single time.
I have same monitor and i have the same bug with google chrome.
And appears its with internet explorer too
I think it started 1 or 2 patches ago
It doesn't happen until i open browser and then it continues even if i close the browser

It matters for some situations since the Beta Client is built on the Chromium framework, similar to Chrome or other chromium-based browsers. Do your symptoms happen if you [**perform a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3)? This will ensure no problematic applications are running in the background.

Let me know if this helped.
